publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1593# Brian Adam: North East of Scotland Sports Facilities—That the Parliament regrets that the Scottish Executive and sportscotland felt unable to come up with the monies requested by Aberdeen City Council and its partners to create modern sports facilities in the city; believes that this will compromise the project; notes that there is a dearth of top-class facilities in the north and north east of Scotland, and considers that the Scottish Executive should rethink its decision and come up with the resources that are needed to allow this project to progress.
S2M-1593# North East of Scotland Sports Facilities (lodged on 30 July 2004) Shiona Baird*, Tommy Sheridan*, Richard Lochhead*
S2M-1593# North East of Scotland Sports Facilities (lodged on 30 July 2004) Mr David Davidson*

S2M-1593 # Brian Adam:North East of Scotland Sports Facilities—That the Parliament regrets that the Scottish Executive and s port s cotland felt unable to come up with the monies requested by Aberdeen City Council and its partners to create modern sports facilities in the c ity; believes that this will compromise the project; notes that there is a dearth of top-class facilities in the n orth and n orth e ast of Scotland, and considers that the Scottish Executive should rethink its decision and come up with the resources that are needed to allow this project to progress. Supported by: Shiona Baird, Tommy Sheridan, Richard Lochhead, Mr David Davidson

S2M-1593# North East of Scotland Sports Facilities (lodged on 30 July 2004) Christine Grahame*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Nora Radcliffe*, Eleanor Scott*, Alex Johnstone*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1593# North East of Scotland Sports Facilities (lodged on 30 July 2004) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
